程序包 org.diku.dms.bds_project

类 RoutingTablePartition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.diku.dms.bds_project.RoutingTablePartition
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class RoutingTablePartition
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    RoutingTablePartition encapsulates a routing table according to each vertex partition. For example, if an element of the routing table is a tuple of array [1, 2, 3] and PartitionId 1 means the vertices 1, 2, 3 should be routed to partition 1.
    另请参阅:

      static <ED> java.util.Iterator<scala.Tuple2<VertexId,​PartitionId>> routingInformationFromEdgePartition​(PartitionId pid, EdgePartition<ED> edgePartition)
      Given partition id `pid` and edge partition `edgePartition`, generate a tuple of vertex id and partition id, for each vertex id contained in EdgePartition, and return them as an iterator.

    • 方法详细资料

      • routingInformationFromEdgePartition

        public static <ED> java.util.Iterator<scala.Tuple2<VertexId,​PartitionId>> routingInformationFromEdgePartition​(PartitionId pid,
                                                                                                                    EdgePartition<ED> edgePartition)
        Given partition id `pid` and edge partition `edgePartition`, generate a tuple of vertex id and partition id, for each vertex id contained in EdgePartition, and return them as an iterator.
        类型参数:
        ED - edge attribute data type
        参数:
        pid - partition id
        edgePartition - an `EdgePatition` instance
        返回:
        an iterator of vertex id and partition id pairs

      • fromRoutingInformation

        public static <ED,​VD> RoutingTablePartition fromRoutingInformation​(int numEdgePartition,
                                                                         java.util.Iterator<scala.Tuple2<VertexId,​PartitionId>> iter)
        For a vertex partition, given a collection of vertex id and partition id pairs, convert them to `RoutingTablePartition.`
        类型参数:
        ED - edge attribute data type
        VD - vertex attribute data type
        参数:
        numEdgePartition - the number of partitions of an `EdgeRDD` instance
        iter - the iterator of tuples of vertex id and partition id contained in the vertex partition
        返回:
        a new `RoutingTablePartition`
